result.purpose: Responsible for managing device data in a database through repository interfaces and models.
result.architecture: Follows a repository pattern to abstract data access and manipulation for device management.

internal/domains/devicemanager/repos/dev.purpose: Defines a repository interface and implementation for managing device data in a database.

internal/domains/devicemanager/repos/mod.purpose: Defines the device model and conversion functions for the device manager domain.
